name: Kill To Live
description:
Kill To Live is a single player military first person shooter. Your task is simple - to get to the exit, killing as many enemy soldiers as possible along the way. Your health decreases with every second and extermination of enemies is the most effective way to restore it. At your service is an arsenal of modern weapons and five spacious arenas. Show your accuracy!

Features:


  • Continuous shooting
  • Five levels
  • Five types of weapons
  • Realistic graphics
  • Dynamic soundtrack
